name: Axon Ivy IDP
description: Axon Ivy IDP is a powerful Intelligent Document Processing solution, transforming document-intensive processes into streamlined, efficient workflows.

descriptions.value: Axon Ivy IDP is a powerful Intelligent Document Processing solution, transforming document-intensive processes into streamlined, efficient workflows.
Axon Ivy IDP ist eine umfassende Lösung für die intelligente Dokumentenverarbeitung, die dokumentenintensive Prozesse in schlanke, effiziente Workflows verwandelt.
